summary:
SpellStrip 1.1 for Skyrim by Kokomal

A Skyrim version of my small and simple Oblivion mod - Spellstrip. Hopefully it will help people with slower machines to gain some FPS. Cheers
descriptionHtml:
SpellStrip 1.2 for Skyrim by Kokomal


In a \"quest\" for better FPS i made this mod that \"strips\" magic spells of their shaders, lights and enchantments. 
I did this for Oblivion many years ago, so now with the CK out I thought I make It again to help people with weaker PC\'s. 
If you have a good PC, with good Graphic card and good CPU, please do not use this mod.

IMPORTANT!

1. This mod is mostly made for people with slower machines.
2. Backup your save games before installing just any mod.
3. This mod IS NOT compatible with any other mod altering magic effects!!!

Change log:
I had some sleepless nights over the 1.2 update. I removed more shaders and enchantments from spells, potions etc. Big update! 
Install!

Copy spellstrip-skyrim.esp to your Skyrim\\data dir, open the launcher and \"check\" the spellstrip.esp in \"data files\".

Uninstall!

Uncheck spellstrip-skyrim.esp and delete the file from your \"Data\" Dir.
Once again! Always backup your save games before \"testing\" or installing new mods!

Known issues/bugs!

None so far.

Special thanks to:

The awesome Skyrim modders and the community!
author: kokomal
